TopicTitle: Bug in the VAB when removing command capsules

Articles.Content: I noticed the bug a few hours after early access lunch but couldn't figure out what was the cause until now. The bug causes the vehicle to act like it doesn't have a command pod or probe even do it has, you can activate the SAS and the RCS but with no control. The bug starts when you remove a command capsule (in my case the MK-1-3 Gumball) and replace it with a probe RC001S. Took me a day to pinpoint the problem
